desc.message: Find your favorite NES game and call your friends, no matter how far you are, you can enjoy the NES game immediately on the NESBox, save the progress, continue next time.

feature1Title.message: Massive games for you to choose

feature1Desc.message: NESBox collected a large number of NES games. After starting your favorite game, Nesbox will create a room, you can invite friends to play together.

feature2Desc.message: NESBox reliable technology allows you and your friends to conduct low-latency videos and audio transmission, just like playing in the same room.

feature3Desc.message: NESBox can synchronize your keys, rendering settings, and sound settings. When you switch the device, you can quickly play the game.
